main.name: Vijay Nara
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Vijay! . An Indian who has good knowledge of software development but a technical consultant by profession, astrophile by interest and biophilic in life. I have always struggled to answer when asked for what qualities I have. But one day, I realized that I am observing(strong), adjustable to the environment so flexible, good at communication(have studied English literature a lot), thoughtless when intended and deep thinker and focused when required, the nature attracts me(cannot ignore any movement around me), loves everyone in the world(have done things for strangers happiness), Quick thinker(very quick actually), good performer at sports(highly motivated), loves science(logic is something that my thoughts crave for), creative also(test me). I also write blogs related to anything that can be given a thought. I acknowledge that all information here is verified by me carefully.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you are looking for a quality support!

education.degree: Diploma, Programmer Analyst and Web Development
education.description: About to graduate this week with Good Marks

work.title: Technical Support
work.description: Provide Technical Assistance related to Servers, Outlook, Active Directory

testimonials.text: Vijay is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship is remarkable
Learning with Vijay has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable by doing Projects
